result.purpose: Defines data transfer objects (DTOs) for handling Ethereum-related requests and signature operations in a web3 context.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing related DTOs for different request types in separate files to promote maintainability and clarity.

internal/domains/web3/handlers/dtos/requ.purpose: Defines data transfer objects for decoding Ethereum-related requests.
Defines request DTOs for handling signature-related operations in a web3 context.
